review_text: I love these slides. I have wide feet and they are not tight at all. They are VERY comfortable I wear them around the house. I'll definitely bit more to wear ...
Muy buen estilo son cómodas y duradera se ajustan a tu pie y podrás caminar con comodidad material de muy buena calidad color adactada a tu estilo
Duración increíble,comodidad máxima el estilo me encanta,la calidad muy buena y la talla se ajusta a la adecuada,las recomiendo totalmente para cualquier persona

They are the most comfortable slides out there. I use them while running errands or beach vacations.Literally the best. Using them since two years now and gonna buy some for the rest of my family as well.

Ciabatte Nike che ormai hanno 12 anni.. iper resistenti e iper comode.. nonostante tutti questi anni sono ancora belle, il design è quello classico della Nike. Ideali sia per donna che per uomo. Le consiglio sia per la comodità ma anche per la traspirazione e la misura, unica pecca il prezzo in quanto costano veramente tanto..

Super comfortable and stylish — perfect for everyday wear or after workouts. The cushioned sole and soft strap make them easy to wear for hours. Durable, easy to clean, and look great. Solid choice for casual comfort.
These slides are very versatile, comfortable and stylish. Whether it's a day at the beach or a stroll through town, these slides are built to last. Fit is true to size as well.
El material de estas sandalias es de muy buena calidad, duradero, son muy suaves para caminar, puedes usarlas con diferentes estilos, están muy hermosas y elegantes
Me encantan además de bonitas son super cómodas, es mi estilo y queda genial tanto para ir a la playa o piscina como para ir en vaqueros quedan muy chulas
Estas chanclas están diseñadas oara ofrecer comodidad y soporte los que la hacen ideales para el uso diario especialmente en climas cálidos para actividades acuáticas
I only wear slides. And these are the most comfortable pair I own. Normally my feet start to hurt or the sides will rub blisters, but I haven’t had any issues out of these.

Con este producto obtienes comodidad extrema en comparación a otros modelos ,la calidad del material y suavidad es lo que más satisfecha me tiene,cuenta con un estilo moderno sin dejar de ser elegante la medida corresponde y noto una larga durabilidad las recomiendo
This is such a good style it’s so supportive,Durable and perfect for a comfortable fit.I really like these i use them for everything and i will definitely be buying more

I’ve been wearing my Nike Benassi Swoosh slides for years now and honestly, I still love them. The footbed is nice and cushioned – even after standing or walking around for a while my feet feel great. The classic Nike swoosh design on the strap is super sleek, so they go with pretty much any casual outfit. Best of all, I’ve worn these all summer after summer and they’ve held up like champs – no cracks, no fading, just as comfy and stylish as day one.
Love this so comforting n comfortable I wear theses all the time my favorite shoe love them n I love these sandals would get them again n same color
Elle sont super confortable, vraiment très peu cher pour la marque, elle taille plutôt bien, par contre elle s’abîme assez vite c’est dommage !
This is my 3rd pair. (one set i lost and another i ruined with paint....) They are hard on the feet until broken in. But are the most comfortable, long term slides ever. Highly recommended

I e had these slides for 5+ years, and while they’re worn and well loved, they are still holding up strong with daily use. I wear them out and about and around the house. They are so comfortable and durable. Classic style, that can be dressed up or down. I will be replacing mine with the same ones when the time comes.
The rubber material is comfortable, and it's seems to be waterproof. Fits perfect. Material is great.These are pretty strong my son literally love and cherish these slides
Son cómodos, es acorde a la talla ya que muchos pares de chanclas vienen más grandes o pequeñas, la calidad es 8/10 y son durable siempre y cuando sepas cuidarla. El estilo es casual
Très jolie claquettes de piscine ou pour aller à la plage Elles sont solides et surtout pratiques Elles sont aussi antidérapante Un confort assuré qui donne du style

these are the perfect shoe to slip on for quick outtings for errands and are so comfortable and cute! they don’t bother make the annoying sandal sound like most sandals of this style, and they don’t rub my foot like some sandals do.

Ik heb de Nike Benassi Swoosh Slides gescoord en ik ben fan! Ze zitten echt lekker, met een zachte band en een zool die je voeten pampert. Ideaal om thuis te chillen, even naar de winkel te sjezen of na het sporten. Ze zien er ook gewoon tof uit met die vette Swoosh, past bij alles. Qua maat zitten ze goed, maar de band was eerst een tikkie strak omdat m’n voeten wat breder zijn. Na een paar keer dragen top. Ze voelen stevig, zijn zo schoon, en voor €35 vind ik ze echt een steal. Alleen niet super voor natte plekken, want de band zuigt wat water op. Echt een chille slide voor elke dag! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ (4/5)
Ho comprato queste ciabatte per abbinarle al costume mare di mio marito sono comodissime le porta anche in casa misura perfetta molto durevoli

I absolutely love these Nike slides. They are so comfortable my feet is in heaven when i wear them. Also by looking at the material you can see that it’s durable. You will get your money’s worth guys.

Very comfortable, super recommended I used them several semany for different types of activities, they look great for going out for a walk.They are of very good quality and also the material with which they were made is comfortable
Misure alla portata di tutti qualità di materiale marca Nike stile egregio comode anzi comodissime e durature nel tempo non si rompono mai ma proprio mai
Go to slides. This is highly comfortable and stylish. It’s also very durable and has a sleek fit on the feet. Value for money . I love it and it’s one of he best things I have purchased
Really like wearing these either on the beach or just at home. Comfortable fit with good support and durability is very good as is the quality. Would buy again
They fit and support your feet very well. They are durable and stylish too! I recommend getting these! They are super comfortable and you can use them anywhere.
Sooo comfortable I think I have these in every color They are my goto for the beach, a quick trip down the street or even a casual all day event. They last forever and never go out of style.

I’ve been using the Nike Benassi Swoosh Slides for a while now, and they’ve become my go-to for casual wear, especially in warmer weather. The comfort is next level – the footbed feels cushioned and supportive, even after hours of wear. They fit true to size, have a sleek, sporty look, and are super durable; I’ve used mine at the beach, around the house, and even for quick errands. I love how easy they are to slip on, and the quality has stayed consistent despite frequent use and it’s cute

Very comfortable shoes. Easy to put on and off. Everyone in my family has them! Wear them out everyday, they are especially useful when I take my sun to soccer so that he can easily change his cleats.

This slides are my go-to for daily wear. The fit is true to size, and the soft cushioning makes them super comfy even after hours of use. They’re lightweight, breathable, and easy to slip on—perfect for quick errands or chilling at home. The grip on the sole prevents slipping, and the strap feels secure without digging into my foot. I’ve worn them nonstop and they’ve held up great, even with rough use. Definitely a staple in my footwear rotation.
La comodidad es increíble el estilo que leda a la ropa la durabilidad es magistral la calidad es estupenda las amo son mis favoritas son agradables

I have had these slides for about a year and a half, and they are doing great. They are comfortable and so easy to put outfits with. They fit pretty well depending on your foot size, but they are also really good-lasting and fit nice around your feet, not too tight or loose. They are just perfect.
Did not like them. Uncomfortable with no arch support. They look like prison shoes. Not very attractive. The velcro was not tight enough and they slipped around on my feet.

The price range is perfect and you don’t have to spend too much. The customer service and return policy is amazing. And there are so many items (meds) to choose from. Also the shipping speed was super-fast. Details on Photo.
I love them especially when going through airport security. Very comfortable matches with any clothes super comfortable. I will definitely buy them again .
Great for everyday wear. Goes well with any outfit wheather it be indoors or out. It has great quality that you can depend on and expect for a big brand like nike
They are comfy and don’t slide off your feet while walking and are very trendy and in style right now too and they’re very durable. I would recommend!
I buy these for my husband and he loves them. They are comfortable and stylish. They are the perfect slides. They are very durable and last a long time.
This sandals are so comfortable to wear daily. I took it a long way but still did not have any feet pain. It is simple in style but still young and modern. It is also fitted and true in my size.
Very easy to slip on and very comfortable for a lazy day off of work. They are very durable and these are my second pair. They last a long time. I would buy them in all colors.
Super confortable… j’adore particulièrement ce design… j’wi le mien depuis quelques années il est comme neuf.. le prix est abordable. Je vous le conseille vivement

Love these slides. They are my house slides. Super comfortable. Supportive of the arch in my foot. Ive had them for three years and theyre still in great shape. And they are breathable so my feet dont get sweaty and stinky.

These Nike Benassi Swoosh Slides are exactly what I needed—simple, stylish, and ridiculously comfortable. The footbed has just the right amount of cushion, so they offer great support . Super easy to slide on when I’m heading out or just lounging around. Bonus: they’re lightweight but feel durable and offer , so I don’t worry about them wearing out anytime soon. If you’re after a no-fuss, wear-them-everywhere kind of slide, this is it.

I have they for 2?years but it still holding up so well ! Nike are pretty popular model, they are very comfortable to wear and they’re very flexible suble for a lot of weather types and it very easy to clean!!! I love them
